noQuestions.title: Azikho Imibuzo Etolakalayo
noQuestions.description: Azikho imibuzo etholakalayo ngalesi sihloko. Sicela uzame esinye isihloko.

question1.text: Iyini incazelo eyinhloko yezinto eziphilayo nezingaphili?
question1.option1: Kuyahlukaniswa izinto ngokusekelwe ekusebenziseni kwazo kubantu
question1.option2: Kugxilwa ekutheni izinto ziyakwazi yini ukuhamba noma cha
question1.option3: Kuhlanganisa izici zobhayoloji kanye nokusebenzisana kwemvelo

question2.text: Yikuphi okungeyona into eyisici sezinto eziphilayo?

question3.text: Izinto eziphilayo nezingaphili zihlukaniswa kanjani ezimeni zangempela?
question3.option4: Ngokuhlola izici ezifana nokukhula nokuphendula izikhuthazo

question4.text: Iyiphi into eyisisekelo sokuqonda izinto eziphilayo nezingaphili?
question4.option1: Izimiso eziyisisekelo ezifana nokukhula, ukuphefumula, nokuzala
question4.option2: Ukwazi amagama azo zonke izilwane nezitshalo

question5.text: Iyiphi inkambu esondelene kakhulu nocwaningo lwezinto eziphilayo nezingaphili?
